detail_desc: Narrow waist belts in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 1.5 cm.

Set with a fine-knit cardigan and a long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton with a bow tie. Cardigan with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs, button band and hem. Wide trousers in an airy, patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y). Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, raw-edge hems.

Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Softshell jacket in water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elastic drawstring and small peak, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Size of chest pocket approx. 12x17 cm.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, wrapover funnel collar, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Metal hair grips. Length 5 cm.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
